name: Global4Net sp. z o.o.
tagline: E-commerce and innovation company from Poland
description:
Global4Net is a rapidly growing e-commerce and innovation company headquartered in Wrocław, Poland.
The company offers a wide range of technology and consulting services, including graphic projects, surveys on software usability, audit, implementation, sale systems integration, hosting and more. Utilizing its business consulting and technology expertise, Global4Net makes e-commerce more convenient, "smarter"​ and faster as the society becomes more digital oriented.
